snippet: The story of a short-lived baseball team, the Portland Mavericks, is revisited in “The Battered Bastards of Baseball.”
abstract: Daniel M Gold reviews documentary film The Battered Bastards of Baseball, directed by Chapman Way and Maclain Way.
lead_paragraph: The story of a short-lived baseball team, the Portland Mavericks, is revisited in “The Battered Bastards of Baseball.”

headline.seo: ‘The Battered Bastards of Baseball,’ About an Underdog Team
headline.kicker: Movie Review | 'The Battered Bastards of Baseball'
